title: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
OB: When I create a working set with one project and select it, the package view is filtered.
EB: At the moment of deletion, the package view in the background should not be refiltered. Refiltering should only occur when closing the working set selection dialog, not during the manipulation. Additionally, pressing cancel should cancel all changes made to the working sets, including canceling the remove operation.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a working set with one project.
2. Select the working set.
3. Observe that the package view is filtered.
4. Remove the working set immediately and observe that the package view is refiltered automatically.
